titleStmt.title: The triumphs ouer death: or, A consolatorie epistle, for afflicted mindes, in the affects of dying friends. First written for the consolation of one: but now published for the generall good of all, by R.S. the author of S. Peters complaint, and Mœoniæ his other hymnes
titleStmt.author: Southwell, Robert, Saint, 1561?-1595.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by V[alentine] S[immes] for Iohn Busbie, and are to be sold at Nicholas Lings shop at the west end of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Nicholas Lings shop at the west end of Paules Church
